title: FS: T202 Caught Asleep Off First, Bresnahan/Harmon, SGC 20
author: Beatles Guy

posts.post_title: FS: T202 Caught Asleep Off First, Bresnahan/Harmon, SGC 20
posts.post_content:
Up for sale is a T202 Caught Asleep Off First, Bresnahan/Harmon, SGC 20.  Full disclosure, the case is split at seam on the bottom hslf.  I will secure this with some tape so that the card will not slide around during shipping, but it will need a re-holder.  I'm asking $40 shipped, regular Paypal please.
